Generators/Sequences

  //@GeneratedValue(generator="HIBERNATE_SEQUENCE", strategy = GenerationType.AUTO)

  @GenericGenerator(name = "gen", strategy = "org.hibernate.id.enhanced.SequenceStyleGenerator",
      parameters = {@org.hibernate.annotations.Parameter(name = "sequence_name", value = "seq_trader_id")
      })*/
